title: cool looking dingbats
content:
hi i was wondering if anyone can give me some imput on some cool dingbat fonts. i am looking for some cool looking “hearts” “smiley faces” and “peace sign.” should not be OVERLY stylized.. something more modern looking... could also have a 70’s vibe but totally not necessary.

thanks in advance!
author: tannenhauser

comments.content:
You can try these from Blue Vinyl fonts. They are free as well.

[http://www.bvfonts.com/fonts/details.php?id=7](http://web.archive.org/web/20091207085629/http:/www.bvfonts.com/fonts/details.php?id=7 "http://www.bvfonts.com/fonts/details.php?id=7")

Fontalicious had some great dingbat sets. Very cool, if slightly juvenile, but many have the very ’70s vibe you’re looking for. And lo and behold! [They’re available again!](http://web.archive.org/web/20091207085629/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?search=action&category=1060&keywords=all)
